directions: Mix ricotta cheese, sweetener and vanilla extract.
Add in eggs gradually and continue to beat until smooth.
Spoon the batter into 4 ramekins and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: 2 cups low-fat ricotta cheese* (refer recipe below)
title: Low Carb Baked Ricotta Cheesecake (for South Beach Phase 1)
